text: way@hi<RBM>y b*iymey<PAS> S@po<MUN>T haW/*.o<SIL>p@Ti<ZQP>ym way@hi<MER>y rA`A<TIP>b b*A'A<ATN>rEY way*e<AZL>lEk@ 'i<GER>yS mib*e<DAR>yt lE<MUN>xEm y@hw*dA<RBM>h lAgw*r<PAS> b*iW@de<MUN>y mw^o'A<ZQP>b h<MER>w*' w@'iS@t*<TIP>w^o w*S@ne<MER>y bAnA<SIL>yw:

w@Se<MUN>m hA'i<MUN>yS '<HSE><SIL>liymE<PAZ>lEk@ w@Sem<TLP> 'iS@t*<AZL>w^o nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<GER>y w@Se<MER>m S@ne<SIL>y=bAnA<MUN>yw | max@l<MEH>w^on w@kil@yw^on<PAS> 'Ep@rAti<ZQP>ym mib*e<MER>yt lE<TIP>xEm y@hw*dA<ATN>h way*Abo<MER>'w* W@dey=mw^o'A<TIP>b way*i<SIL>h@yw*=SA<SIL>m:
way*A<MER>mAt '<HSE>liymE<TIP>lEk@ 'i<MUN>yS nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<ATN>y wat*iW/*.A'e<MER>r hi<TIP>y' w*S@ne<MER>y bAnE<SIL>yhA:
way*iW@'<MUN>w* lAhE<RBM>m nASiym<PAS> mo<SIL>'<HPA>biy*<ZQP>w^ot Se<MEH>m hA<SIL>'axat<PAS> `Ar@p*A<ZQP>h w@Se<MER>m haW/*.eni<TIP>yt r<ATN>w*t way*e<MER>S@bw* SA<TIP>m k*@`E<MER>WEr SAni<SIL>ym:
way*Amu<MER>tw* gam=S@neyhE<TIP>m max@l<MUN>w^on w@kil@y<ATN>w^on wat*iW/*.A'er<PAS> hA<SIL>'iW/*.A<ZQP>h miW/*.@ne<MER>y y@lAdE<TIP>yhA w*me<SIL>'iySA<SIL>h*:

wat*A<MEH>qAm hiy'<PAS> w@kal*otE<ZQP>yhA wat*A<TIP>SAb miW/*ׂ@de<MUN>y mw^o'A<ATN>b k*i<MEH>y SA<SIL>m@`Ah<PAS> b*iW@de<MUN>h mw^o'A<ZQP>b k*i<SIL>y=pAqa<MEH>d y@hwAh<PAS> 'Et=`am*<ZQP>w^o lAte<MER>t lAhE<TIP>m lA<SIL>xEm:
wat*eYe<RBM>' min=ham*Aqw^om<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r hA<SIL>y@tAh=W/*.A<ZQP>m*Ah w*S@t*e<MER>y kal*w^otE<TIP>yhA `im*A<ATN>h* wat*ela<MUN>k@nAh bad*E<ZQP>rEk@ lAS<TIP>w*b 'El='E<MER>rEY y@hw*dA<SIL>h:

wat*o<MEH>'mEr nA<SIL>`<HQA>miy<PAS> liS@t*e<MUN>y kal*otE<ZQP>yhA le<MUN>k@nAh W/*.o<ZQP>b@nAh 'iW/*.A<TIP>h l@be<MUN>yt 'im*A<ATN>h* y`W/h (ya<MUN>`aW) y@hwA<MEH>h `im*AkEm<PAS> xE<ZQP>sEd k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<DAR>r `<HPA>WiytE<TEB>m `im=ham*eti<TIP>ym w@`im*Adi<SIL>y:
yit*e<MEH>n y@hwAh<PAS> lAkE<ZQP>m w*m@YE<MUN>'nA m@nw*xA<ZQP>h 'iW/*.A<TIP>h b*e<MUN>yt 'iySA<ATN>h* wat*iW/*.a<MUN>q lAhE<ZQP>n wat*iW/*ׂE<MER>'nAh qw^olA<TIP>n wat*ib@k*E<SIL>ynAh:
wat*o'ma<TIP>r@nAh=l*A<ATN>h* k*i<SIL>y='it*A<MER>k@ nAS<TIP>w*b l@`am*e<SIL>k@:

wat*o<MEH>'mEr nA<SIL>`<HQA>miy<PAS> So<MUN>b@nAh b@nota<ZQP>y lA<MER>m*Ah tela<TIP>k@nAh `im*i<ATN>y ha`<SIL>w^od=li<MEH>y bAniym<PAS> b*@<SIL>me`a<ZQP>y w@hAy<MER>w* lAkE<TIP>m la<SIL>'<HPA>nASi<SIL>ym:

So<MEH>b@nAh b@notay<PAS> le<ZQP>k@nA k*i<MER>y zAqa<TIP>n@t*iy mi<SIL>h@y<MUN>w^ot l@'i<ATN>yS k*i<MEH>y 'Ama<AZL>r@t*iy<PAS> yES=li<MUN>y tiq@wA<ZQP>h g*a<MUN>m hAyi<MEH>ytiy hal*a<AZL>y@lAh<PAS> l@'i<ZQP>yS w@ga<TIP>m yAla<MER>d@t*iy bAni<SIL>ym:

h<HPA>lAhe<MUN>n | t*@Wab*e<RBM>r@nAh `a<YET>d '<HPA>SE<MUN>r yig@d*A<ZQP>lw* h<HPA>lAhen<PAS> t*e<SIL>`Age<ZQP>nAh l@bil@t*i<TIP>y h<HSE>y<MUN>w^ot l@'i<ATN>yS 'a<MUN>l b*@nota<RBM>y k*i<SIL>y=mar=li<MEH>y m@'od<PAS> mik*E<ZQP>m k*i<SIL>y=yAY@'A<MER>h bi<TIP>y yad=y@hwA<SIL>h:
wat*iW/*ׂE<MUN>nAh qw^olA<ZQP>n wat*ib@k*E<TIP>ynAh `<ATN>w^od wat*iW/*.a<MEH>q `Ar@p*Ah<PAS> la<SIL>x<HPA>mw^otA<ZQP>h* w@r<TIP>w*t d*A<MER>b@qAh b*A<SIL>h*:
wat*o<RBM>'mEr hin*eh<PAS> SA<MUN>bAh y@bim@t*e<ZQP>k@ 'El=`am*A<TIP>h* w@'El='<HSE>lohE<ATN>yhA S<TIP>w*biy 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<MER>y y@bim@t*e<SIL>k@:

wat*o<MEH>'mEr rw*t<PAS> 'al=t*ip@g*@`iy=bi<ZQP>y l@`Az@be<TIP>k@ lAS<MUN>w*b me'a<SIL>x<HPA>rA<ATN>yik@ k*i<TLM>y 'El='<HPA>SE<AZL>r t*e<SIL>l@ki<GER>y 'ele<RBM>k@ w*ba<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MEH>r t*Ali<AZL>yniy<PAS> 'Ali<ZQP>yn `am*e<MUN>k@ `am*i<ZQP>y we<SIL>'loha<TIP>yik@ '<HSE>lohA<SIL>y:

b*a<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MEH>r t*Am<AZL>w*tiy<PAS> 'Am<ZQP>w*t w@SA<TIP>m 'Eq*Abe<ATN>r k*oh<TLP> ya<SIL>`<HPA>WE<AZL>h y@hwA<MER>h liy<PAS> w@ko<MUN>h yw^osi<ZQP>yp k*i<MUN>y ham*A<ZQP>wEt yap@ri<TIP>yd b*eyni<MER>y w*beyne<SIL>k@:
wat*e<ZQM>rE' k*i<SIL>y=mit@'am*E<MER>YEt hi<TIP>y' lAlE<MUN>kEt 'it*A<ATN>h* wat*Ex@d*a<TIP>l l@dab*e<MER>r 'elE<SIL>yhA:

wat*ela<MUN>k@nAh S@t*eyhE<ZQP>m `ad=b*w^o'A<TIP>nAh b*e<MUN>yt lA<ATN>xEm way@hi<RBM>y k*@bw^o'A<AZL>nAh<PAS> b*e<MUN>yt lE<ZQP>xEm wat*eho<MEH>m k*Al=hA`iyr<PAS> `<HPA>leyhE<ZQP>n wat*o'ma<TIP>r@nAh h<HPA>zo<MER>'t nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<SIL>y:
wat*o<MUN>'mEr '<HPA>leyhE<ZQP>n 'al=t*iq@rE<MER>'nAh li<TIP>y nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<ATN>y q@rE<MEH>'nA liy<PAS> mArA<ZQP>' k*i<SIL>y=hema<MER>r Sad*a<TEB>y li<TIP>y m@'o<SIL>d:

'<HPA>niy<PAS> m@le'A<MUN>h hAla<ZQP>k@t*iy w@reyqA<TIP>m h<HSE>Siyba<MUN>niy y@hwA<ATN>h lA<MUN>m*Ah tiq@rE<MEH>'nAh liy<PAS> nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<ZQP>y wa<SIL>yhwAh<PAS> `A<MUN>nAh bi<ZQP>y w@Sad*a<TIP>y he<MER>ra<SIL>` li<SIL>y:

wat*A<MUN>SAb nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<RBM>y w@r<AZL>w*t ham*<SIL>w^o'<HPA>biy*A<MEH>h kal*AtAh*<PAS> `im*A<ZQP>h* haW/*.A<TIP>bAh miW/*ׂ@de<MUN>y mw^o'A<ATN>b w@he<RBM>m*Ah b*A<YET>'w* b*e<MUN>yt lE<ZQP>xEm b*it@xil*a<TIP>t q@Yi<MER>yr W@`ori<SIL>ym:
w*<SIL>l@nA`<HQA>mi<GAR>y myd` (mw^odA<MUN>`) l@'iySA<RBM>h* 'i<YET>yS g*ib*<MUN>w^or xa<ZQP>yil mim*iS@p*a<TIP>xat '<HSE>liymE<ATN>lEk@ w*S@m<TIP>w^o b*o<SIL>`az:

wat*o'mEr<TLP> r<AZL>w*t ham*<SIL>w^o'<HPA>biy*A<GER>h 'E<SIL>l=nA`<HQA>mi<RBM>y 'e<SIL>l@kAh=n*A<MEH>' haW/*ׂAdEh<PAS> wa<SIL>'<HPA>laq*<HQA>TA<MUN>h ba<SIL>W/*.ib*<HQA>li<ZQP>ym 'axa<ZQM>r '<HPA>SE<MER>r 'Em@YA'=xe<TIP>n b*@`eynA<ATN>yw wat*o<MER>'mEr lA<TIP>h* l@ki<MER>y bit*i<SIL>y:

wat*e<MEH>lEk@ wat*Abw^o'<PAS> wat*@laq*e<MUN>T b*aW/*ׂAdE<ZQP>h 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<TIP>y haq*o<SIL>Y@ri<ATN>ym way*i<MUN>qEr miq@rE<ZQP>hA xEl@qa<MEH>t haW/*ׂAdEh<PAS> l@bo<ZQP>`az '<HPA>SE<TIP>r mim*iS@p*a<MER>xat '<HSE>liymE<SIL>lEk@:
w@hin*eh=bo<RBM>`az b*A<YET>' mib*e<MUN>yt lE<ZQP>xEm way*o<MER>'mEr laq*<SIL>w^oY@ri<TIP>ym y@hwA<MUN>h `im*AkE<ATN>m way*o<MER>'m@rw* l<TIP>w^o y@bA<SIL>rEk@kA<MER> y@hwA<SIL>h:
way*o<MEH>'mEr b*o<AZL>`az<PAS> l@na<SIL>`<HPA>r<ZQP>w^o han*iY*A<TIP>b `al=haq*<SIL>w^oY@ri<ATN>ym l@mi<TIP>y han*a<SIL>`<HPA>rA<MER>h haz*o<SIL>'t:

way*a<RBM>`an han*a<TEB>`ar han*iY*A<MER>b `al=haq*<SIL>w^oY@ri<TIP>ym way*o'ma<ATN>r na<SIL>`<HPA>rA<MEH>h m<SIL>w^o'<HPA>biy*Ah<PAS> hi<ZQP>y' haW/*.A<MER>bAh `i<SIL>m=nA`<HQA>mi<TIP>y miW/*ׂ@de<MER>y mw^o'A<SIL>b:

wat*o<RBM>'mEr '<HPA>laq*<HQA>TAh=n*A'<PAS> w@'A<SIL>sap@t*i<MUN>y bA<SIL>`<HQA>mAri<ZQP>ym 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<TIP>y haq*<SIL>w^oY@ri<ATN>ym wat*Ab<MUN>w^o' wa<SIL>t*a`<HPA>m<RBM>w^od me'A<MEH>z hab*o<AZL>qEr<PAS> w@`ad=`a<ZQP>t*Ah zE<TEB>h Sib@t*A<MER>h* hab*a<TIP>yit m@`A<SIL>T:

way*o'mEr<TLP> b*o<AZL>`az 'El=r<GER>w*t h<HPA>l<DAR>w^o' SAma<MUN>`at*@ b*it*i<RBM>y 'al=t*e<SIL>l@kiy<PAS> lil@qoT<PAS> b*@WAdE<MUN>h 'axe<ZQP>r w@ga<TEB>m lo<MER>' ta<SIL>`<HPA>bw*ri<TIP>y miz*E<ATN>h w@ko<MER>h tid@b*Aqi<TIP>yn `im=na<SIL>`<HPA>rotA<SIL>y:

`eyna<GER>yik@ b*aW/*ׂAdE<MEH>h '<HPA>SEr=yiq@Yorw*n<PAS> w@hAla<MUN>k@t*@ 'a<SIL>x<HPA>reyhE<ZQP>n h<HPA>l<MER>w^o' Yiw*i<TEB>ytiy 'Et=han*@`Ari<TIP>ym l@bil@t*i<MUN>y nAg@`e<ATN>k@ w@YAmi<RBM>t w@hA<SIL>lak@t*@<PAS> 'El=hak*eli<ZQP>ym w@SAti<ZQM>yt me<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MER>r yiS@'<HPA>b<TIP>w*n han*@`Ari<SIL>ym:

wat*ip*ol<PAS> `al=p*AnE<ZQP>yhA wat*iS@t*a<TIP>xw* 'A<ATN>r@YAh wat*o<MUN>'mEr 'elA<RBM>yw mad*w*`a<TLP> mAYA<AZL>'tiy xe<MEH>n b*@`eynE<AZL>ykA<PAS> l@hak*iyre<ZQP>niy w@'A<SIL>noki<TIP>y nAk@riy*A<SIL>h:

way*a<MEH>`an b*o<AZL>`az<PAS> way*o<MUN>'mEr lA<ZQP>h* hug*e<AZL>d hug*a<GER>d li<RBM>y k*o<MEH>l '<HPA>SEr=`AWiyt<PAS> 'Et=x<HPA>mw^ote<ZQP>k@ 'a<SIL>x<HPA>re<TIP>y m<MUN>w^ot 'iySe<ATN>k@ wat*a<SIL>`az@bi<GAR>y 'Abi<MUN>yk@ w@'im*e<RBM>k@ w@'E<AZL>rEY<PAS> m<SIL>w^olad@t*e<ZQP>k@ wat*e<MUN>l@ki<ZQP>y 'El=`a<ZQM>m '<HPA>SE<MER>r lo<SIL>'=yAda<TIP>`at*@ t*@m<MER>w^ol Sil@S<SIL>w^om:

y@Sal*e<MER>m y@hwA<TIP>h p*A<SIL>`<HQA>le<ATN>k@ w*t@hi<AZL>y maW@k*ur@t*e<GER>k@ S@lemA<RBM>h me`i<MEH>m y@hwAh<PAS> '<HSE>lohe<MUN>y yiW@rA'e<ZQP>l '<HPA>SEr=b*A<TIP>'t la<SIL>x<HPA>s<MER>w^ot t*a<SIL>xat=k*@nApA<SIL>yw:

wa<TLM>t*o'mEr 'Em@YA'=xe<AZL>n b*@`eynE<MEH>ykA '<HPA>doniy<PAS> k*i<MUN>y ni<SIL>xam@t*A<ZQP>niy w@ki<MER>y dib*a<TIP>r@t*A `al=le<MUN>b Sip@xAtE<ATN>kA w@'A<SIL>nokiy<PAS> lo<MUN>' 'E<SIL>h@yE<ZQP>h k*@'axa<TIP>t Sip@xotE<SIL>ykA:

way*o'mEr<TLP> lA<AZL>h bo<GER>`az l@`e<MUN>t hA'o<RBM>kEl g*o<MEH>Si<SIL>y h<HPA>lom<PAS> w@'Aka<MUN>l@t*@ min=hal*E<ZQP>xEm w@TAba<MER>l@t*@ p*it*e<TIP>k@ b*axo<ATN>mEY wat*e<AZL>SEb<PAS> miY*a<MUN>d haq*o<SIL>Y@ri<ZQP>ym way*iY@b*AT=lA<MUN>h* qAli<ZQP>y wat*o<MER>'kal wat*iW@b*a<TIP>` wat*ota<SIL>r:
wat*A<TIP>qAm l@laq*e<ATN>T way@Yaw<TLP> b*o<AZL>`az 'Et=n@`ArA<GER>yw le'mo<RBM>r g*a<MUN>m b*e<DAR>yn hA<SIL>`<HQA>mAri<TEB>ym t*@laq*e<TIP>T w@lo<MER>' tak@liym<SIL>w*hA:
w@ga<TEB>m Sol=t*ASo<MER>l*w* lA<TIP>h* min=haY*@bAti<ATN>ym wa<SIL>`<HPA>zab@t*E<MER>m w@liq*@TA<TIP>h w@lo<MER>' tig@`<HPA>rw*=bA<SIL>h*:
wat*@laq*e<MER>T b*aW/*ׂAdE<TIP>h `ad=hA`A<ATN>rEb wat*ax@b*oT<PAS> 'e<MUN>t '<HPA>SEr=liq*e<ZQP>TAh way@hi<TIP>y k*@'eypA<MER>h W@`ori<SIL>ym:

wat*iW/*ׂA'<PAS> wat*Ab<MUN>w^o' hA`i<ZQP>yr wat*e<MER>rE' x<HPA>mw^otA<TIP>h* 'e<MUN>t '<HPA>SEr=liq*e<ATN>TAh wat*w^oYe'<PAS> wat*it*En=lA<ZQP>h* 'e<MER>t '<HPA>SEr=hw^oti<TIP>rAh miW/*ׂAb@`A<SIL>h*:

wat*o'mEr<TLP> lA<AZL>h* x<HPA>mw^otA<GER>h* 'eypo<AZL>h liq*a<MEH>T@t*@ hay*w^om<PAS> w@'A<MUN>nAh `AWi<ZQP>yt y@hi<MER>y mak*iyre<TIP>k@ b*Ar<ATN>w*k@ wat*ag*e<MUN>d la<SIL>x<HPA>mw^otA<RBM>h* 'e<MEH>t '<HPA>SEr=`A<SIL>W@tAh<PAS> `im*<ZQP>w^o wat*o<RBM>'mEr Se<MEH>m hA'iyS<PAS> '<HPA>SE<AZL>r `AWi<DAR>ytiy `im*<TEB>w^o hay*<TIP>w^om b*o<SIL>`az:

wat*o<AZL>'mEr nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<GER>y l@kal*AtA<RBM>h* b*Ar<MER>w*k@ hw*'<PAS> la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h '<HPA>SEr<PAS> lo<SIL>'=`Aza<MUN>b xas@d*<ZQP>w^o 'Et=ha<SIL>xay*i<TIP>ym w@'Et=ham*eti<ATN>ym wat*o<DAR>'mEr lA<MUN>h* nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<RBM>y qAr<MER>w^ob lA<AZL>nw*<PAS> hA'i<ZQP>yS mi<SIL>g*o'<HPA>le<TIP>nw* h<SIL>w*':

wat*o<TIP>'mEr r<MUN>w*t ham*<SIL>w^o'<HPA>biy*A<ATN>h g*a<MUN>m | k*i<SIL>y='Ama<MUN>r 'ela<RBM>y `im=han*@`Ari<MEH>ym '<HPA>SEr=liy<PAS> t*id@b*Aqi<ZQP>yn `a<MUN>d 'im=k*il*<ZQP>w* 'e<MER>t k*Al=haq*AYi<TIP>yr '<HPA>SEr=li<SIL>y:

wat*o<MER>'mEr nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<TIP>y 'El=r<MUN>w*t k*al*AtA<ATN>h* T<MUN>w^ob b*it*i<RBM>y k*i<MEH>y te<SIL>Y@'iy<PAS> `im=na<MUN>`<HPA>rw^otA<ZQP>yw w@lo<MER>' yip@g*@`w*=bA<TIP>k@ b*@WAdE<MER>h 'axe<SIL>r:
wat*id@b*a<GAR>q b*@na<SIL>`<HPA>r<MER>w^ot b*o<AZL>`az<PAS> l@laq*e<ZQP>T `ad=k*@l<MER>w^ot q@Yi<SIL>yr=haW/*ׂ@`ori<TIP>ym w*q@Yi<MUN>yr ha<SIL>xiT*i<ATN>ym wat*e<TIP>SEb 'Et=x<HPA>mw^otA<SIL>h*:
wat*o<MER>'mEr lA<TIP>h* nA<SIL>`<HQA>mi<MUN>y x<HPA>mw^otA<ATN>h* b*it*i<ZQM>y h<HPA>lo<DAR>' '<HPA>baq*ES=lA<TEB>k@ mAn<TIP>w^oxa '<HPA>SE<MER>r yi<SIL>yTab=lA<SIL>k@:

w@`at*A<RBM>h h<HPA>lo<MER>' bo<AZL>`az<PAS> mo<SIL>da`@t*A<ZQP>nw* '<HPA>SE<MER>r hAyi<TIP>yt 'Et=na<SIL>`<HPA>rw^otA<ATN>yw hin*eh=h<RBM>w*' zorE<TEB>h 'Et=g*o<MER>rEn haW/*ׂ@`ori<TIP>ym hal*A<SIL>y@lAh:

w@rAxa<MUN>Y@t*@ | wAsa<RBM>k@t*@ w@Wa<DAR>m@t*@ W/mltk (Wim@lota<TEB>yik@) `Ala<TIP>yik@ wyrdty (w@yAra<MUN>d@t*@) hag*o<ATN>rEn 'al=t*iw*A<SIL>d@`i<MUN>y lA'i<ZQP>yS `a<MER>d k*al*ot<TIP>w^o lE<SIL>'<HSE>ko<MER>l w@liS@t*<SIL>w^ot:

wiyhi<MUN>y b@SAk@b<RBM>w^o w@yAda<AZL>`at*@<PAS> 'Et=ham*Aqw^om<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r yiS@k*ab=SA<ZQP>m w*bA<TEB>'t w@gil*i<MER>yt mar@g*@lotA<TIP>yw wW/kbty (w@SAkA<ATN>b@t*@) w@hw*'<PAS> yag*i<MUN>yd lA<ZQP>k@ 'e<TIP>t '<HPA>SE<MER>r t*a<SIL>`<HPA>Wi<SIL>yn:
wat*o<TIP>'mEr 'elE<ATN>yhA k*o<TEB>l '<HPA>SEr=t*o<SIL>'m@ri<MER>y     ('ela<TIP>y) 'E<SIL>`<HSE>WE<SIL>h:
